title: Vietnam braces for fallout from US tariffs on Chinese goods
description: Vietnamese Prime Minister Pham Minh Chinh instructed his Cabinet to prepare for a possible global trade war after U.S. President Donald Trump imposed tariffs of 10% on all Chinese products.

title: Trump sees US takeover of Gaza as 'real estate transaction'
description: U.S. President Donald Trump said Friday that his plan for the United States to take ownership of the Gaza Strip should be viewed as a real estate transaction, but he offered no timetable, saying "we're in no rush on it."

title: Trump mulls displacing Gazans to Morocco, Puntland, Somaliland: Report
description: Morocco, Puntland, and Somaliland have been named as potential destinations for Palestinians who can be forcibly expelled from Gaza under US President Donald Trump's controversial plan to "take over" the strip.

title: Panama Denies Making Deal To Allow Free Transit For U.S. Warships Through Canal
description: Panamanian President Jose Raul Mulino has denied the U.S. State Department's claim that his country had reached a deal allowing U.S. warships to transit the Panama Canal for free.

title: Defense Secretary Underscores DOD Priorities During Pentagon Town Hall
description: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth today reiterated his core priorities for the Defense Department during a town hall meeting with service members and DOD civilians at the Pentagon.

title: UN human rights chief urges respect for int'l law following Trump's Gaza remarks
description: UN High Commissioner for Human Rights Volker Turk on Thursday underscored the necessity of upholding international law following U.S. President Donald Trump's Gaza takeover proposal.

title: Slovenian president criticizes U.S. sanctions against ICC
description: Slovenian President Natasa Pirc Musar said on Friday that U.S. sanctions against the International Criminal Court (ICC) undermine the foundations of international criminal law.

title: Iran condemns US sanctions on ICC, highlights Washington's complicity in Israeli crimes
description: Iran's Foreign Ministry has strongly condemned the United States' imposition of sanctions on the International Criminal Court (ICC), calling it an egregious abuse of power aimed at shielding the Israeli regime from accountability for its crimes.

title: International Criminal Court condemns US sanctions move
description: The International Criminal Court (ICC) on Friday condemned an executive order signed by United States President Donald Trump imposing punitive sanctions, countering that the order sought to "harm its independent and impartial judicial work."

title: Trump signs executive order imposing sanctions on ICC
description: U.S. President Donald Trump signed an executive order Thursday imposing sanctions on the International Criminal Court (ICC), claiming that the court "has engaged in illegitimate and baseless actions targeting America and our close ally Israel."

title: U.S. president imposes sanctions on ICC amid investigation of Israel
description: U.S. President Donald Trump has signed an executive order imposing sanctions on the International Criminal Court (ICC), claiming that the body is treating the U.S. and Israel unfairly.

title: Trump sanctions ICC for Israel, US probes
description: US President Donald Trump has signed an executive order slapping sanctions on the International Criminal Court (ICC) for what he called baseless investigations targeting America and its close ally Israel over genocide in Gaza.

title: Trade dominates Trump's talks with Japanese leader
description: U.S. President Donald Trump said Friday he would back a deal for Japan's Nippon Steel to invest in U.S. Steel rather than purchasing the company, potentially creating an avenue for the two allies to overcome a growing irritant in their relationship.

title: Trump hosts Japan's Ishiba amid early moves that have rattled some allies
description: U.S. President Donald Trump hosts Japanese Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba at the White House on Friday, in a visit that Tokyo hopes will reaffirm the U.S.-Japan alliance amid Trump's early foreign policy moves that have rattled allies and adversaries.
